title: Zanab247
author: Zanab247
content: This is what is making some people in the community not to get it right in their life because, they don't want to get prepare by saving some money in their bank account waiting for the price of BTC to dump before they can buy and hodl for long period of time before they can sell to improve their wealth like the way some people in this local board has achieved their goal through preparedness. We can see that the price of BTC is heading to were some BTC investors will regret for not buy BTC when the price was low, but they know how to predict the price of BTC, when the price will reach before they will buy and when the price get to that particular prediction no money to invest because they didn't prepare for it.Hope you guys prepare for what is coming soon in the crypto market? If you are not prepared you still have time to visit the crypto market to buy potential coins that will make you prepare for the bull run that is about to occur before investors will start selling their coins to smile like the way long term and short hodlers smile in the year 2021.  I'm prepared to hodl my coins to see the price I have never see before in crypto market before I will sell to save some money to prepare for another bear run to come to get another opportunity.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Preparedness is very important in every investment you wish to do in the future. Proper planning is required for every investment and how to prepare for it varies for every investor. But the best strategy to employ will be to have gotten enough coins in your portfolio before the bull run arrives. Some may not have prepared for it now but the amount of profit they will stand to get after bull run will be more than those who have opted in the market for earlier because of the amount of money they will put in at once. Everything is an opportunity and if you don’t grab it when it’s still early, you’ll either lose some part or whole of the opportunity when you want to invest at the time you’re ready.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: There is a big difference between preparation and acting. You can take forever to prepare, but if you fail to act, there's no proof of how prepared you were. The halving next year is no longer a new topic and it has passed the moment of just preparing to invest in bitcoin. Actionable activities is  demanded from anyone who intends to benefit from it. Remember, early to bed, early to rise. The price of bitcoin is increasing considerably now, and whoever has invested before now has started seeing his/her gains. Delay is definitely dangerous, l advise you don't wait to accumulate heavy  sums before investing. It can be done on a slow and steady basis. To be a good investor, consistency is key and remember, little drops of water makes a mighty ocean. Every Investor needs to act fast and start now if you've been preparing all along.

comments.body: Exactly preparing for the next bear is the most important thing right now since many people have missed out the last year and early this year bear market to accumulate more Bitcoin to their portfolios. But I still believe it is not too late, because the price will still go up well well so if anyone want to buy and hodle, let them do now so that when the price goes up to the ATH then you sell it off and take your profit.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Preparedness is better than prediction, real facts.For instance, imagine a kid who dreams of becoming a Doctor in future. In achieving this dream, this kid has to go to school, read books, get acquainted with the medical profession and environment then, he's prepared to serve! Note that firstly, the kid gets to prepare. Every reasonable and sane adult should see preparation for any task he or she needs to accomplish as top priority because, in course of preparation one is able to identify weaknesses, threats, opportunities and strengths in whatever business he/she has to deal with in due time. Preparedness has never left a single space for failure rather it is a pavement for success and security. Prediction on the other hand looks more like procrastination and that doesn’t help anyone.when you keep on predicting what will be when you don’t have a prepared backup plan to fall back to should in case a problem arises is really messy. It always leaves a space for devastation and hopelessness. In order to succeed, there is a great earning that comes with preparedness other than predicting.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: In life, it is good we are ready for anything that will happen rather than just staying one place and begin to make speculation and predictions on how the future will be, though is still good to make predictions for the future but it is important for us to be prepared for whatever thing that the future might hold be it negatively or positively.So many a person just sit and make predictions without putting in efforts in other for those predictions to come to reality, so inasmuch as cryptocurrencies more especially the most volatile of them all being bitcoin is concerned, we do not need any soothsayer to tell us what the future of Bitcoin holds as we are already seeing the handwriting on the wall so is left for us to start buying and hodling Bitcoin now rather making speculation of the price dipping before we can start buying. For the fact that Bitcoin hasn't attain it's ATH is enough to make us to understand that it is never to late to accumulate Bitcoin now because there will absolutely be an explosion (rapid boom) in Bitcoin after the halving in the bull market.

comments.body: On paper, the first paragraph may make sense in a utopia world but in reality it is not pragmatic. Waiting in the crypto space is not a viable strategy. Better still I'll use both of them like a authentication. While you expect a dump or bear market continue with your dollar cost averaging strategy. Do not carried away by too much optimism.
